channel.title: Client Packet Error
channel.description:
Hi Every time i use 2specs clientv 6.2.. I click change server i put mine in and then i try logging in and it logs in for about a second and logs me out and i get this error [code]Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection[/code] And everytime i try relogging in with same client it just repeats the error... Can anyone tell me how to solve this please
Thanks

item.title: Client Packet Error
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

have you tried with a different client? if it works with a different one, then it’s a client problem. if not, it’s a server problem.

Read full topic
